## R Markdown

```{r}
df <- read.csv("sturgeon_DepthProfile_data.csv")

params<-names(df)
nparams<-length(params)

for(i in 4:nparams){
  temp<-df %>% 
    select(profile_depth,SAMPLE_DATE,params[i])
  temp$result <- as.numeric(temp[,3])
  temp<-temp %>% 
    select(profile_depth,SAMPLE_DATE,result) %>% 
    filter(!is.na(result)) %>% 
    distinct()
  plot(ggplot(temp,aes(y=profile_depth,x=result,colour=SAMPLE_DATE))+
         geom_path()+
         scale_y_reverse()+
         ggtitle(params[i]))
  rm(temp)
}

```
